question: Who recently set the Guinness record for the fastest 400 metres on roller skates blindfolded in the girls’ category?
explanation: 12-year-old girl Ojal Sunil Nalavadi as she set the Guinness record for the fastest 400 metres on roller skates blindfolded in the girls category on November 14. Ojal Nalavadi completed the feat successfully in 51 seconds on the TenderSure road at Shirur Park area in Hubli, Karnataka. Guinness Book of World Record officer Victor Fenes confirmed Ojal Nalavadi’s feat and handed her a certificate.
